Package com.spleefleague.core.menu

Class InventoryMenuItemHotbar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spleefleague.core.menu.InventoryMenuItem
      • com.spleefleague.core.menu.InventoryMenuItemHotbar
  • public class InventoryMenuItemHotbar
extends InventoryMenuItem
    Contains a static list of all Hotbar items that are created for quick referencing by the custom "hotbar" nbt tag
